engrams.name: Sloped Thatch Roof
engrams.description: An inclined Thatch roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

engrams.name: Sloped Thatch Wall Left
engrams.description: A simple Thatch sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with a roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Thatch Wall Right
engrams.description: A simple Thatch sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with a roof.

engrams.name: Thatch Door
engrams.description: Enough sticks bundled together works as a simple door. Can be locked for security, but not very strong.

engrams.name: Thatch Doorframe
engrams.description: This thatch wall has an entrance in it, but requires more wood to stay stable.

engrams.name: Thatch Foundation
engrams.description: A foundation is required to build structures. This one is a wooden frame with some smooth bundles of sticks that act as a floor.

engrams.name: Thatch Roof
engrams.description: A thatched roof to protect you from the elements. Not stable enough to build on.

engrams.name: Thatch Wall
engrams.description: A simple wall made of bundled sticks, and stabilized by a wooden frame. Fairly fragile, but better than nothing.

engrams.name: Campfire
engrams.description: Perfect for cooking meat, staying warm, and providing light.

engrams.name: Cooking Pot
engrams.description: Must contain basic fuel to light the fire. Put various ingredients with water in this to make soups, stews, and dyes.

engrams.name: Hide Sleeping Bag
engrams.description: This hide sleeping bag acts as a single-use respawn point, only usable by you.

engrams.name: Simple Bed
engrams.description: Thatch may not make the most comfortable mattress, but this bed acts as a respawn point for you and your Tribe.

engrams.name: Mortar and Pestle
engrams.description: This simple stone contraption can be used to grind resources into new substances.

engrams.name: Refining Forge
engrams.description: Requires wood, thatch, or sparkpowder to activate. Put unrefined resources in this to refine them.

engrams.name: Smithy
engrams.description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create certain advanced forged items.

engrams.name: War Drums
engrams.description: A set of tribal wardrums, to let everyone around hear the power of your tribe.

engrams.name: Wooden Bench
engrams.description: A simple wooden bench for solo sitting.

engrams.name: Wooden Chair
engrams.description: A simple wooden chair for solo sitting.

engrams.name: Wooden Table
engrams.description: A simple wooden table with a variety of uses.

engrams.name: Compost Bin
engrams.description: A large bin for converting thatch and dung into high-quality fertilizer.

engrams.name: Large Crop Plot
engrams.description: A large garden plot, with a fence to keep out vermin.

engrams.name: Medium Crop Plot
engrams.description: A medium garden plot, with a fence to keep out vermin.

engrams.name: Small Crop Plot
engrams.description: A small garden plot, with a fence to keep out vermin.

engrams.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Inclined
engrams.description: An inclined stone pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down hills.

engrams.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Intake
engrams.description: The stone intake for an irrigation network that transports water over land.

engrams.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Intersection
engrams.description: A plus-shaped stone intersection for an irrigation network, used for splitting one water source into three.

engrams.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Straight
engrams.description: A straight stone pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water across land.

engrams.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Tap
engrams.description: This stone tap allows access to the water in an irrigation network. Can refill containers, irrigate crop plots, or provide a refreshing drink.

engrams.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Vertical
engrams.description: A vertical stone pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down cliffs.

engrams.name: Water Reservoir
engrams.description: A standing storage device for holding water. Automatically fills up during rain, can be filled up with the use of a water skin/jar.

engrams.name: Preserving Bin
engrams.description: Burns simple fuel at low temperatures to dehydrate food and kill bacteria. Keeps perishables from spoiling for a small time.

engrams.name: Spear
engrams.description: An easily made melee weapon that can also be thrown. Has a chance to break when used.

engrams.name: Stone Hatchet
engrams.description: A sharp flint hatchet for harvesting wood from trees, stone from rocks, and skin from bodies.

engrams.name: Stone Pick
engrams.description: A large stone pick for harvesting primarily flint from rocks, thatch from trees, and raw meat from bodies.

engrams.name: Torch
engrams.description: Provides light, and some warmth. Doubles as a melee weapon in a pinch.

engrams.name: Wooden Club
engrams.description: A easily made melee weapon that is excellent for knocking out targets. Only effective at short range.

engrams.name: Bola
engrams.description: Wind it up and throw!

engrams.name: Bow
engrams.description: Masters of the bow often became great conquerors. Requires arrows to fire.

engrams.name: Slingshot
engrams.description: A simple ranged weapon that deals damage from afar. Better for knocking out a target than killing it outright. Requires stone to fire.

engrams.name: Stone Arrow
engrams.description: An arrow for the bow.

engrams.name: Tranquilizer Arrow
engrams.description: Less deadly than other arrows, but rapidly increases the victim's torpidity.

engrams.name: Tripwire Alarm Trap
engrams.description: Place two of these near each other to create a trap.

engrams.name: Tripwire Narcotic Trap
engrams.description: Place two of these near each other to create a poisonous trap.

engrams.name: Smoke Grenade
engrams.description: Releases a lot of smoke to obscure your plans. Pulling the pin starts a 5 second timer to an explosion.

engrams.name: Cloth Boots
engrams.description: Hide-soled shoes provide some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

engrams.name: Cloth Gloves
engrams.description: Hide-padded gloves provide some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

engrams.name: Cloth Hat
engrams.description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

engrams.name: Cloth Pants
engrams.description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

engrams.name: Cloth Shirt
engrams.description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

engrams.name: Wooden Shield
engrams.description: A wooden shield on a layer of leather. Absorbs damage from the front when activated.

engrams.name: Hide Boots
engrams.description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

engrams.name: Hide Gloves
engrams.description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

engrams.name: Hide Hat
engrams.description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

engrams.name: Hide Pants
engrams.description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

engrams.name: Hide Shirt
engrams.description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

engrams.name: Ghillie Boots
engrams.description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool. Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures. Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

engrams.name: Ghillie Chestpiece
engrams.description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool. Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures. Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

engrams.name: Ghillie Gauntlets
engrams.description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool. Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures. Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

engrams.name: Ghillie Leggings
engrams.description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool. Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures. Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

engrams.name: Ghillie Mask
engrams.description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool. Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures. Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

engrams.name: Araneo Saddle
engrams.description: Equip an Araneo with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Argentavis Saddle
engrams.description: Equip an Argentavis with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Beelzebufo Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Beelzebufo with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Carbonemys Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Carboenemys with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Dire Bear Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Dire Bear with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Hyaenodon Meatpack
engrams.description: Equip a Hyaenodon with this to give it increased meat carrying & preservation capability.

engrams.name: Ichthyosaurus Saddle
engrams.description: Equip an Ichthyosaurus with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Kaprosuchus Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Kaprosuchus with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Megalodon Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Megalodon with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Pachy Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Pachy with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Pachyrhinosaurus Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Pachyrhinosaurus with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Parasaur Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Parasaur with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Pelagornis Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Pelagornis with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Phiomia Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Phiomia with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Pteranodon Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Pteranodon with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Pulmonoscorpius Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Pulmonoscorpius with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Raptor Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Raptor with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Sarco Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Sarco with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Stego Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Stego with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Terror Bird Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Terror Bird with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Trike Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Triceratops with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Compass
engrams.description: Use this to find which direction you are traveling.

engrams.name: Beer Jar
engrams.description: Mmmmm.

engrams.name: Beer Liquid
engrams.description: Put it in a glass jar to drink it!

engrams.name: Cooked Fish Meat
engrams.description: Sates your hunger SLIGHTLY, and provides health while being digested. Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

engrams.name: Cooked Lamb Chop
engrams.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than prime meat. Wild carnivores LOVE this meat!

engrams.name: Cooked Meat
engrams.description: Sates your hunger and provides health while being digested. Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

engrams.name: Cooked Prime Fish Meat
engrams.description: Sates your hunger SLIGHTLY, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

engrams.name: Cooked Prime Meat
engrams.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild Carnivores like this meat a lot.

engrams.name: Charcoal
engrams.description: Created by burning wood.

engrams.name: Bug Repellant
engrams.description: This gnarly paste makes you nearly invisible to bugs. Just don't attack them, and they'll ignore you! Effect lasts 10 minutes.

engrams.name: Lesser Antidote
engrams.description: Cures Lesser Afflictions!

engrams.name: Narcotic
engrams.description: Increases your health, but puts you to sleep.

engrams.name: Stimulant
engrams.description: Keeps you awake, but dehydrates you.

engrams.name: Absorbent Substrate
engrams.description: This sticky compound excels at absorbing other chemicals.

engrams.name: Cementing Paste
engrams.description: Paste created at Mortar and Pestle.

engrams.name: Gunpowder
engrams.description: A powerful propellant. Necessary for any firearm or explosive.

engrams.name: Sparkpowder
engrams.description: Created by grinding flint with stone in a Mortar and Pestle.

engrams.name: Battle Tartare
engrams.description: Only eat this dish when you intend to go into a brawl. It causes pain and stress to your body, but grants you almost supernatural strength, speed, and resilience. Warning: This concoction can be habit forming.

engrams.name: Broth of Enlightenment
engrams.description: A single sip of this incredible broth will expand your mind and broaden your horizons, granting greatly increased experience gain for a brief time.

engrams.name: Calien Soup
engrams.description: This simple vegetarian dish refreshes you body like an oasis. Helps keep you stay hydrated and feel cool.

engrams.name: Enduro Stew
engrams.description: This hearty dish is like a workout in the form of a meal. You will find yourself hitting harder and running longer after eating this.

engrams.name: Energy Brew
engrams.description: his brew doesn't have any nutritional value, but fills your stamina.

engrams.name: Focal Chili
engrams.description: This filling dish is full of nutritional energy. Consume it to gain increased crafting speed, and gain increased movement speed. Effect lasts 15 minutes.

engrams.name: Fria Curry
engrams.description: his spicy vegetarian dish fills the body with a comfortable warmth. It controls your appetite while helping you ignore cold.

engrams.name: Lazarus Chowder
engrams.description: This creamy dish improves the body's natural constitution. You will recover from injury more quickly after eating this, and your body will need less oxygen.

engrams.name: Medical Brew
engrams.description: This brew doesn't have any nutritional value, but it promotes healing.

engrams.name: Mindwipe Tonic
engrams.description: When consumed, this tonic causes neural overload. Synapses fire off too quickly resulting in damage to the memory centers of the brain related to construction. Warning: this concoction may cause temporary memory loss, and resetting of Engrams.

engrams.name: Shadow Steak Saute
engrams.description: Only eat this dish in the dark. It causes the light receptors in your eyes to become hyperactive, improves your hand-eye coordination, and allows your body to ignore extreme temperatures. Warning: this concoction can be habit-forming.

engrams.name: Sweet Vegetable Cake
engrams.description: A sappy-sweet vegetable cake which Herbivores find delicious, which will be automatically eaten when needed for healing. Alas, humans and carnivores tend to find its taste repugnant.

engrams.name: Black
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Blue
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Brick
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Brown
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Cantaloupe
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Cyan
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Forest
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Green
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Magenta
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Mud
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Navy
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Olive
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Orange
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Parchment
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Pink
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Purple
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Red
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Royalty
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Silver
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Sky
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Slate
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Tan
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Tangerine
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: White
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Yellow
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Basic Kibble
engrams.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many smaller creatures. Includes plant fibers to help with digestion and egg to bind the mix. Humans have difficulty digesting this.

engrams.name: Simple Kibble
engrams.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many small creatures. Includes plant fibers to help with digestion and egg to bind the mix. Humans have difficulty digesting this.

engrams.name: Regular Kibble
engrams.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many medium creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

engrams.name: Superior Kibble
engrams.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many larger creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

engrams.name: Exceptional Kibble
engrams.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many extra large creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

engrams.name: Extraordinary Kibble
engrams.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many exotic creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

engrams.name: Charcoal
engrams.description: Created by burning wood.

engrams.name: Soap
engrams.description: Scrubs dye and paint off items and structures!

engrams.name: Industrial Cooker
engrams.description: Burns Gasoline to cook large quantities of food quickly. Put various ingredients in this to make soups, stews, and dyes.

engrams.name: Industrial Grill
engrams.description: Perfect for cooking meat in bulk, staying warm, and providing light. Powered by Gasoline.

engrams.name: Bunk Bed
engrams.description: This modern bunk-style bed has two mattresses, and a high thread count. Acts as a respawn point for you and your tribe with half cooldown time.

engrams.name: Chemistry Bench
engrams.description: Place materials in this to transmute chemical substances with extreme efficiency!

engrams.name: Industrial Forge
engrams.description: Refines resources in bulk. Powered by gasoline.

engrams.name: Industrial Grinder
engrams.description: Grind up crafted items and certain resources!

engrams.name: Auto Turret
engrams.description: Requires electricity to run. Consumes bullets while firing. Can be configured to automatically attack hostiles within range.

engrams.name: Heavy Auto Turret
engrams.description: Requires electricity to run. Provides increased firepower, but consumes FOUR bullets while firing. Can be configured to automatically attack hostiles within range.

engrams.name: Elevator Track
engrams.description: Attach an Elevator Platform to these to complete an elevator!

engrams.name: Large Elevator Platform
engrams.description: Attach to an Elevator Track to carry a large amount of weight.

engrams.name: Medium Elevator Platform
engrams.description: Attach to an Elevator Track to carry a medium amount of weight.

engrams.name: Small Elevator Platform
engrams.description: Attach to an Elevator Track to carry a small amount of weight.

engrams.name: Electrical Cable - Inclined
engrams.description: An inclined cable for transmitting electricity up and down hills.

engrams.name: Electrical Cable - Intersection
engrams.description: A plus-shaped intersection for a power grid, used for splitting one power cable into three.

engrams.name: Electrical Cable - Straight
engrams.description: A straight cable, used for transmitting electricity across land.

engrams.name: Electrical Cable - Vertical
engrams.description: A vertical cable for transmitting electricity up and down cliffs.

engrams.name: Electrical Generator
engrams.description: A large machine that converts gasoline into electricity.

engrams.name: Electrical Outlet
engrams.description: An outlet for an electrical grid. When connected to a generator via cables, this provides power to all nearby devices that use electricity.

engrams.name: Air Conditioner
engrams.description: Requires electricity to run. Provides insulation from both the heat and the cold to an area.

engrams.name: Lamppost
engrams.description: Requires electricity to activate. Lights an area without adding much heat.

engrams.name: Omnidirectional Lamppost
engrams.description: Requires electricity to activate. Lights an area without adding much heat.

engrams.name: Refrigerator
engrams.description: Requires electricity to run. Keeps perishables from spoiling for a long time.

engrams.name: Remote Keypad
engrams.description: Allows remote access to multiple doors and/or lights.

engrams.name: Advanced Bullet
engrams.description: A small-caliber modern bullet, primarily used with fabricated handguns.

engrams.name: Advanced Rifle Bullet
engrams.description: Primarily used with fabricated rifles.

engrams.name: Advanced Sniper Bullet
engrams.description: A high-caliber modern bullet, primarily used with fabricated sniper rifles

engrams.name: C4 Charge
engrams.description: This advanced explosive can annihilate structures.

engrams.name: Metal Arrow
engrams.description: An armor-and-hide piercing metal arrow.

engrams.name: Pheromone Dart
engrams.description: A dart full of refined Ammonite chemicals, inject on a target to enrage nearby wild creatures. For use in a Longneck Rifle. Can not be used with attachments.

engrams.name: Rocket Propelled Grenade
engrams.description: A small but powerful explosive, primarily used with rocket launchers.

engrams.name: Shocking Tranquilizer Dart
engrams.description: A doubly potent dart full of refined Cnidaria toxin, which also shocks humans. For use in a Longneck Rifle. Can not be used with attachments.

engrams.name: C4 Remote Detonator
engrams.description: This device uses radio waves to detonate all primed C4 packages on the same frequency.

engrams.name: Poison Grenade
engrams.description: Releases narcotic smoke to knock out anything in the area - only affects humans. Pulling the pin starts a 2.5 second timer to the gas release.

engrams.name: Assault Rifle
engrams.description: The fastest way to fill a target with holes.

engrams.name: Fabricated Pistol
engrams.description: This advanced pistol gains a high rate of fire and a large magazine size by sacrificing stopping power.

engrams.name: Fabricated Sniper Rifle
engrams.description: This semi-automatic rifle has less punch than a Longneck Rifle, but can be fired much more rapidly.

engrams.name: Pump-Action Shotgun
engrams.description: Powerful up close, but less reliable with range. Can fire six rounds before reloading.

engrams.name: Rocket Launcher
engrams.description: Mankind's ultimate portable killing device.

engrams.name: Flashlight Attachment
engrams.description: This flashlight sheds light out in a wide area, but makes you easier to see too. Attach this to a supporting weapon to shine light from a weapon.

engrams.name: Holo-Scope Attachment
engrams.description: This advanced scope can tell friends from strangers. Attach this to a supporting weapon to gain more accurate aiming.

engrams.name: Laser Attachment
engrams.description: This advanced aiming device places a red dot where the weapon is pointed. Attach this to a supporting weapon to add a laser sight.

engrams.name: Riot Shield
engrams.description: A metal-framed shield reinforced with polymer and crystal. Absorbs damage from the front when activated.

engrams.name: SCUBA Flippers
engrams.description: These flippers are firm, but flexible. Wearing them increases swim speed, but decreases walking speed.

engrams.name: SCUBA Leggings
engrams.description: Provides little defense, but tremendous hypothermal insulation, specifically when underwater.

engrams.name: SCUBA Mask
engrams.description: Connects to a SCUBA Tank, allowing the wearer to breathe underwater for as long as the tank has oxygen.

engrams.name: SCUBA Tank
engrams.description: A tank that's filled with Oxygen. Used to temporarily breathe underwater.

engrams.name: Riot Boots
engrams.description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

engrams.name: Riot Chestpiece
engrams.description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

engrams.name: Riot Gauntlets
engrams.description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

engrams.name: Riot Helmet
engrams.description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

engrams.name: Riot Leggings
engrams.description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

engrams.name: Gas Mask
engrams.description: Protects the wearer against various airborne poisons.

engrams.name: Night Vision Goggles
engrams.description: Effortlessly see in the dark, though beware blindingly bright light sources!

engrams.name: GPS
engrams.description: Detects strange energy from the three Obelisks to triangulate your exact location on the island.

engrams.name: Transponder Node
engrams.description: Can be attached to living Creatures to track their location.

engrams.name: Transponder Tracker
engrams.description: Uses strange energy from the three Obelisks to triangulate all Transponder Nodes on the specified frequency.

engrams.name: Electronics
engrams.description: This multipurpose computer chip can be used to create electronic devices.

engrams.name: Polymer
engrams.description: These incredibly strong, lightweight plates can be shaped and then heat treated into casings for anything.

engrams.name: Battle Tartare
engrams.description: Only eat this dish when you intend to go into a brawl. It causes pain and stress to your body, but grants you almost supernatural strength, speed, and resilience. Warning: This concoction can be habit forming.

engrams.name: Broth of Enlightenment
engrams.description: A single sip of this incredible broth will expand your mind and broaden your horizons, granting greatly increased experience gain for a brief time.

engrams.name: Calien Soup
engrams.description: This simple vegetarian dish refreshes you body like an oasis. Helps keep you stay hydrated and feel cool.

engrams.name: Enduro Stew
engrams.description: This hearty dish is like a workout in the form of a meal. You will find yourself hitting harder and running longer after eating this.

engrams.description: his brew doesn't have any nutritional value, but fills your stamina.

engrams.description: Only eat this dish in the dark. It causes the light receptors in your eyes to become hyperactive, improves your hand-eye coordination, and allows your body to ignore extreme temperatures. Warning: this concoction can be habit-forming.

engrams.description: A sappy-sweet vegetable cake which Herbivores find delicious, which will be automatically eaten when needed for healing. Alas, humans and carnivores tend to find its taste repugnant.

engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Blue
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Brick
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Brown
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Cantaloupe
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Cyan
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Forest
engrams.description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

engrams.name: Basic Kibble
engrams.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many smaller creatures. Includes plant fibers to help with digestion and egg to bind the mix. Humans have difficulty digesting this.

engrams.name: Simple Kibble
engrams.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many small creatures. Includes plant fibers to help with digestion and egg to bind the mix. Humans have difficulty digesting this.

engrams.name: Regular Kibble
engrams.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many medium creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

engrams.name: Superior Kibble
engrams.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many larger creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

engrams.name: Exceptional Kibble
engrams.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many extra large creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

engrams.name: Extraordinary Kibble
engrams.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many exotic creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

engrams.name: Soap
engrams.description: Scrubs dye and paint off items and structures!

engrams.name: Gasoline
engrams.description: An advanced fuel. Can only be used in machines designed to consume it.

engrams.name: Metal Ingot
engrams.description: Created by refining metal ore in a forge.

engrams.name: Cooked Fish Meat
engrams.description: Sates your hunger SLIGHTLY, and provides health while being digested. Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

engrams.name: Cooked Lamb Chop
engrams.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than prime meat. Wild carnivores LOVE this meat!

engrams.name: Cooked Meat
engrams.description: Sates your hunger and provides health while being digested. Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

engrams.name: Cooked Prime Fish Meat
engrams.description: Sates your hunger SLIGHTLY, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

engrams.name: Cooked Prime Meat
engrams.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild Carnivores like this meat a lot.

engrams.name: Bug Repellant
engrams.description: This gnarly paste makes you nearly invisible to bugs. Just don't attack them, and they'll ignore you! Effect lasts 10 minutes.

engrams.name: Lesser Antidote
engrams.description: Cures Lesser Afflictions!

engrams.name: Narcotic
engrams.description: Increases your health, but puts you to sleep.

engrams.name: Stimulant
engrams.description: Keeps you awake, but dehydrates you.

engrams.name: Cementing Paste
engrams.description: Paste created at Mortar and Pestle.

engrams.name: Gunpowder
engrams.description: A powerful propellant. Necessary for any firearm or explosive.

engrams.name: Sparkpowder
engrams.description: Created by grinding flint with stone in a Mortar and Pestle.

engrams.name: Charcoal
engrams.description: Created by burning wood.

engrams.name: Gasoline
engrams.description: An advanced fuel. Can only be used in machines designed to consume it.

engrams.name: Metal Ingot
engrams.description: Created by refining metal ore in a forge.

engrams.name: Beer Barrel
engrams.description: Ferments tasty brew from Thatch, Water, and Berries

engrams.name: Fabricator
engrams.description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create certain high-end machined items.

engrams.name: Toilet
engrams.description: Attach to water pipes, and sit on it when you hear the call of nature. Do your business, feel refreshed, and then flush for efficient waste disposal!

engrams.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Inclined
engrams.description: An inclined metal pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down hills.

engrams.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Intake
engrams.description: The metal intake for an irrigation network that transports water over land.

engrams.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Intersection
engrams.description: A plus-shaped metal intersection for an irrigation network, used for splitting one water source into three.

engrams.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Straight
engrams.description: A straight metal pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water across land.

engrams.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Tap
engrams.description: This metal tap allows access to the water in an irrigation network. Can refill containers, irrigate crop plots, or provide a refreshing drink.

engrams.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Vertical
engrams.description: A vertical metal pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down cliffs.

engrams.name: Metal Water Reservoir
engrams.description: Attach this to pipes to store rain, irrigation, or manually deposited water for later use. Will automatically irrigate nearby crops if attached to a tap. Stores a large amount of water!

engrams.name: Greenhouse Ceiling
engrams.description: A metal-framed, glass ceiling that provides insulation, and doubles as a floor for higher levels. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

engrams.name: Greenhouse Door
engrams.description: A metal-frame, glass door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

engrams.name: Greenhouse Doorframe
engrams.description: A metal-frame, glass wall that provides entrance to a structure. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

engrams.name: Greenhouse Wall
engrams.description: A metal-framed, glass wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

engrams.name: Greenhouse Window
engrams.description: Metal-framed, glass plates on hinges that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

engrams.name: Sloped Greenhouse Roof
engrams.description: An inclined metal-frame, glass roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

engrams.name: Sloped Greenhouse Wall Left
engrams.description: A metal-frame, glass sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

engrams.name: Sloped Greenhouse Wall Right
engrams.description: A metal-frame, glass sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

engrams.name: Metal Sword
engrams.description: The undisputed ruler of short-range combat. Needs a hotter flame to be forged.

engrams.name: Cannon Ball
engrams.description: A gigantic ball of heavy metal, capable of demolishing very strong structures.

engrams.name: Chain Bola
engrams.description: A gigantic bola made of metal chain, capable of ensnaring larger creatures. Usable within a Ballista turret.

engrams.name: Grappling Hook
engrams.description: Apply on the Crossbow to grapple onto the environment & other creatures. Primary Fire to "Reel-In", Secondary Fire to "Reel-Out", Crouch to Detach, Jump + Reel-In to Vault-Jump!

engrams.name: Simple Bullet
engrams.description: Primarily used with forged handguns.

engrams.name: Simple Rifle Ammo
engrams.description: An odd bullet and casing, used with forged rifles.

engrams.name: Simple Shotgun Ammo
engrams.description: A few simple bullets in a hide casing, used with forged shotguns.

engrams.name: Spear Bolt
engrams.description: A massive bolt with a cast iron arrowhead. Can only be used in a Ballista Turret or a Harpoon Gun. If it doesn't break, you can recover your ammo.

engrams.name: Tranq Spear Bolt
engrams.description: A massive bolt with a tranq dart mounted on the front. Used as an underwater tranquilizer projectile with the Harpoon Gun. If it doesn't break, you can recover the spear bolt.

engrams.name: Tranquilizer Dart
engrams.description: A potent dart full of tranquilizing poison. For use in a Longneck Rifle. Can not be used with attachments.

engrams.name: Grenade
engrams.description: Pulling the pin starts a 5 second timer to an explosion. Make sure you've thrown it by then.

engrams.name: Improvised Explosive Device
engrams.description: Place two of these near each other to create an explosive trap.

engrams.name: Longneck Rifle
engrams.description: This simple single-shot rifle is highly accurate, but has a long reload time.

engrams.name: Shotgun
engrams.description: Very powerful up close, but less reliable with range.

engrams.name: Simple Pistol
engrams.description: This simple revolver trades accuracy for flexibility.

engrams.name: Scope Attachment
engrams.description: The carefully shaped crystal lenses in this scope grant the user a telescopic aim when firing. Attach this to a supporting weapon to gain more accurate aiming.

engrams.name: Silencer Attachment
engrams.description: The lubricated materials in this silencer slow the gases released from a gunshot, muffling the sounds. Attach this to a supporting weapon for reduced noise when firing.

engrams.name: Metal Shield
engrams.description: A metal shield on a layer of leather. Absorbs damage from the front when activated.

engrams.name: Chitin Boots
engrams.description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

engrams.name: Chitin Chestpiece
engrams.description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

engrams.name: Chitin Gauntlets
engrams.description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

engrams.name: Chitin Helmet
engrams.description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

engrams.name: Chitin Leggings
engrams.description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

engrams.name: Fur Boots
engrams.description: Provides significant physical protection. Also keeps your temperature up, so long as it stays dry.

engrams.name: Fur Cap
engrams.description: Provides significant physical protection. Also keeps your temperature up, so long as it stays dry.

engrams.name: Fur Chestpiece
engrams.description: Provides significant physical protection. Also keeps your temperature up, so long as it stays dry.

engrams.name: Fur Gauntlets
engrams.description: Provides significant physical protection. Also keeps your temperature up, so long as it stays dry.

engrams.name: Fur Leggings
engrams.description: Provides significant physical protection. Also keeps your temperature up, so long as it stays dry.

engrams.name: Allosaurus Saddle
engrams.description: Equip an Allosaurus with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Ankylo Saddle
engrams.description: Equip an Ankylo with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Arthropluera Saddle
engrams.description: Equip an Arthropluera with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Baryonyx Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Baryonyx with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Basilosaurus Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Basilosaurus with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Bronto Platform Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Bronto with this to ride it. You can build structures on the large platform to make a mobile base.

engrams.name: Bronto Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Bronto with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Carno Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Carnotaurus with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Castoroides Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Giant Beaver with this to ride it. Can be used as a mobile Smithy! Sounds pretty good eh?

engrams.name: Chalicotherium Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Chalicotherium with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Daeodon Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Daeodon with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Diplodocus Saddle
engrams.description: A saddle for your Diplodocus. It has ten seats! Bring lots of friends!

engrams.name: Doedicurus Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Doedicurus with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Dunkleosteus Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Dunkleosteus with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Equus Saddle
engrams.description: A saddle for your horse. Useful for crafting chemical supplies on the go!

engrams.name: Gallimimus Saddle
engrams.description: A saddle for your Gallimimus. It has three seats! Bring your friends!

engrams.name: Giganotosaurus Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Giganotosaurus with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Iguanodon Saddle
engrams.description: Equip an Iguanodon with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Mammoth Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Mammoth with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Manta Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Manta with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Megalania Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Megalania with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Megaloceros Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Megaloceros with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Megalosaurus Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Megalosaurus with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Megatherium Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Megatherium with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Mosasaur Platform Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Mosasaurus with this to ride it. You can build structures on the large platform to make a mobile base.

engrams.name: Mosasaur Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Mosasaurus with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Paracer Platform Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Paraceratherium with this to ride it. You can build structures on the large platform to make a mobile base.

engrams.name: Paracer Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Paraceratherium with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Plesiosaur Platform Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Plesiosaur with this to ride it. You can build structures on the large platform to make a mobile base.

engrams.name: Plesiosaur Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Plesiosaur with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Procoptodon Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Procoptodon with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Quetz Platform Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Quetzal with this to ride it. You can build structures on the large platform to make a mobile base.

engrams.name: Quetz Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Quetzal with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Rex Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a T-Rex with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Sabertooth Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Sabertooth with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Spino Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Spino with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Tapejara Saddle
engrams.description: A saddle for your Tapejara. It has three seats! Bring your friends!

engrams.name: Therizinosaurus Saddle
engrams.description: A saddle for your Therizinosaurus.

engrams.name: Thylacoleo Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Thylacoleo with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Titanosaur Platform Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Titanosaur with this to ride it. You can build structures on the large platform to make a mobile base.

engrams.name: Tusoteuthis Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Tusoteuthis with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Woolly Rhino Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Woolly Rhino with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Yutyrannus Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Yutyrannus with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Compass
engrams.description: Use this to find which direction you are traveling.

engrams.name: Radio
engrams.description: Use this to communicate securely over great distances.

engrams.name: Handcuffs
engrams.description: Equip this onto an unconscious player, and they'll be restrained when they wake up!

engrams.name: Fertilizer
engrams.description: A fertilizer high in nitrogen. Use this to help your crops grow.

engrams.name: Cooked Meat Jerky
engrams.description: Sates your hunger and provides health while being digested. Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

engrams.name: Prime Meat Jerky
engrams.description: Sates your hunger and provides health while being digested. Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

engrams.name: Boulder
engrams.description: Massive rock with metal spikes. Can only be used in a Catapult Turret.

engrams.name: Tek Transmitter
engrams.description: Transmits items, Survivors, and creatures to other ARKs! Requires Tek Engram to use.

engrams.name: Tek Grenade
engrams.description: Sticks to targets with a powerful Tek Explosion after 5 seconds. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

engrams.name: Megalodon Tek Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Megalodon with this to ride it. Using requires learning the Tekgram.

engrams.name: Mosasaur Tek Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Mosasaur with this to ride it. Using requires learning the Tekgram.

engrams.name: Rex Tek Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Rex with this to ride it. Using requires learning the Tekgram.

engrams.name: Tapejara Tek Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Tapejara with this to ride it, enabling the rider to fire plasma projectiles. Using requires learning this Tekgram.

engrams.name: Element
engrams.description: A strange, highly advanced material humming with energy. It dissolves when transferred across ARKs.

engrams.name: Element Shard
engrams.description: A small chunk of strange, highly advanced material. It dissolves when transferred across ARKs.

engrams.name: Tek Replicator
engrams.description: Replicate items here. Requires Element to be activated.

engrams.name: Generate Broodmother (Gamma) Portal
engrams.description: Use this to generate a portal to the Broodmother (Easy).

engrams.name: Generate Broodmother (Beta) Portal
engrams.description: Use this to generate a portal to the Broodmother (Medium).

engrams.name: Generate Broodmother (Alpha) Portal
engrams.description: Use this to generate a portal to the Broodmother (Hard).

engrams.name: Generate Megapithecus (Gamma) Portal
engrams.description: Use this to generate a portal to the Megapithecus (Easy).

engrams.name: Generate Megapithecus (Beta) Portal
engrams.description: Use this to generate a portal to the Megapithecus (Medium).

engrams.name: Generate Megapithecus (Alpha) Portal
engrams.description: Use this to generate a portal to the Megapithecus (Hard).

engrams.name: Generate Dragon (Gamma) Portal
engrams.description: Use this to generate a portal to the Dragon (Easy).

engrams.name: Generate Dragon (Beta) Portal
engrams.description: Use this to generate a portal to the Dragon (Medium).

engrams.name: Generate Dragon (Alpha) Portal
engrams.description: Use this to generate a portal to the Dragon (Hard).

engrams.name: Access Tek Cave (Alpha)
engrams.description: Access the Tek Case with this.

engrams.name: Access Tek Cave (Beta)
engrams.description: Access the Tek Case with this.

engrams.name: Access Tek Cave (Gamma)
engrams.description: Access the Tek Case with this.
